fields.name: Rent:
fields.value: $20X where X is the number of Capsule Properties held by the Owner.

fields.name: Stop-in Effects:
fields.value:
Depends on the number of Capsule Properties held by the owner.
1. At random, one of your Properties gets put on Open Auction. The winner pays the Bank, as usual.
2. At random, one of your Properties is put on Closed Auction between you and the Owner of this space. The winner pays the Bank, as usual.
3. At random, ownership of one of your Properties is transferred to the Owner of this space for free.
